hadesmod:Dash.NAME: Dash
hadesmod:Dash.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Your next Strike applies !zzz! Vulnerable.

hadesmod:RuyiJinguBang.NAME: Ruyi Jingu Bang
hadesmod:RuyiJinguBang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Activate your Weapon. NL Exhaust.
hadesmod:RuyiJinguBang.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Activate your Weapon.

hadesmod:PowerOfAnesidora.NAME: Power of Anesidora
hadesmod:PowerOfAnesidora.DESCRIPTION: Weak enemies deal !M! % less damage rather than 25%.

hadesmod:PhotographicMemory.NAME: Photographic Memory
hadesmod:PhotographicMemory.DESCRIPTION: Activate your Weapon !M! times. NL Exhaust.

hadesmod:ArcFortify.NAME: Arc Fortify
hadesmod:ArcFortify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reflect the next debuff applied to you this turn. NL Exhaust.
hadesmod:ArcFortify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Reflect the next debuff applied to you this turn. NL Exhaust.

hadesmod:MiloAndAkouo.NAME: Milo and Akouo
hadesmod:MiloAndAkouo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever enemy attacks damage your Block, apply !M! Vulnerable to the attacker.

hadesmod:CutDust.NAME: Cut Dust
hadesmod:CutDust.DESCRIPTION: Your next Strike grants [E] and draws !zzz! cards.
hadesmod:CutDust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next Strike grants [E] [E] and draws !zzz! cards.

hadesmod:AlternateAnesidora.NAME: Alternate Anesidora
hadesmod:AlternateAnesidora.DESCRIPTION: After playing the first 3 cards in a turn, put !M! *Insight on top of your draw pile.
hadesmod:AlternateAnesidora.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL After playing the first 3 cards in a turn, put !M! *Insight on top of your draw pile.

hadesmod:ArrayStrike.NAME: Array Strike
hadesmod:ArrayStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] . NL Exhaust.
hadesmod:ArrayStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] . NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

hadesmod:ArrayBlast.NAME: Array Blast
hadesmod:ArrayBlast.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Activate your Weapon, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.
hadesmod:ArrayBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Activate your Weapon, deal !M! damage to a random enemy. NL Activate your Weapon.

hadesmod:BarrageStrike.NAME: Barrage Strike
hadesmod:BarrageStrike.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, add a copy of this card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
hadesmod:BarrageStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, add a copy of this card into your hand. NL Exhaust.

hadesmod:AuraAmp.NAME: Aura Amp
hadesmod:AuraAmp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! % increased damage to enemies with at least 2 debuffs.
hadesmod:AuraAmp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !M! % increased damage to enemies with at least 2 debuffs.

hadesmod:ArraysEmbrace.NAME: Array's Embrace
hadesmod:ArraysEmbrace.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Activate your Weapon, draw !M! card.
hadesmod:ArraysEmbrace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Activate your Weapon, draw !M! cards.

hadesmod:Claws.NAME: Claws
hadesmod:Claws.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put an *Insight on top of your draw pile.
hadesmod:Claws.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put an *Insight+ on top of your draw pile.

hadesmod:CrescentDexterity.NAME: Crescent Dexterity
hadesmod:CrescentDexterity.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Drawn hadesmod:Strikes gain hadesmod:Bloodcast this turn.
hadesmod:CrescentDexterity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Drawn hadesmod:Strikes gain hadesmod:Bloodcast this combat.

hadesmod:Snipe.NAME: Snipe
hadesmod:Snipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The top card of your draw pile costs 0 this turn.

hadesmod:Velvet.NAME: Velvet
hadesmod:Velvet.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card during your turn, gain 2 Block.
hadesmod:Velvet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw a card during your turn, gain 2 Block.

hadesmod:Focus.NAME: Focus
hadesmod:Focus.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Strike of any color into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
hadesmod:Focus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded Strike of any color into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

hadesmod:Xactivate.NAME: X-activate
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Swap Weapons. NL Activate your Weapon X times.

hadesmod:MagnhildLauncher.NAME: Magnhild Launcher
hadesmod:MagnhildLauncher.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !secondDamage! damage to ALL enemies.

hadesmod:WeakWep.NAME: Weak and Wep
hadesmod:WeakWep.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Activate your Weapon.
hadesmod:WeakWep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Activate your Weapon.

hadesmod:StrikeSlam.NAME: Strike-Slam
hadesmod:StrikeSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Your next Strike this turn deals !M! additional damage.
hadesmod:StrikeSlam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Your next Strike deals !M! additional damage.

hadesmod:SapPower.NAME: Sap Power
hadesmod:SapPower.DESCRIPTION: Steal up to !M! Strength. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust.

hadesmod:SlowingHit.NAME: Slowing Hit
hadesmod:SlowingHit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

hadesmod:CrescentStrike.NAME: Crescent Strike
hadesmod:CrescentStrike.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Activate your Weapon.

hadesmod:SpookySplit.NAME: Spooky Split
hadesmod:SpookySplit.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !zzz! Vulnerable, split randomly among ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

hadesmod:EnergyWeapons.NAME: Energy Weapons
hadesmod:EnergyWeapons.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Activate your Weapon, gain [E] .
hadesmod:EnergyWeapons.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you Activate your Weapon, gain [E] .

hadesmod:Bloodsight.NAME: Bloodsight
hadesmod:Bloodsight.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL Put an *Insight on top of your draw pile.
hadesmod:Bloodsight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL Put an *Insight+ on top of your draw pile.

hadesmod:QuickActivate.NAME: Quick Activate
hadesmod:QuickActivate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Swap Weapons. NL Activate your Weapon.

hadesmod:FierceCry.NAME: Fierce Cry
hadesmod:FierceCry.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !zzz! Vulnerable. NL Draw 1 card.

hadesmod:StrikeBooster.NAME: Strike Booster
hadesmod:StrikeBooster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Strikes deal !M! additional damage.

hadesmod:Restrikeler.NAME: Restrikeler
hadesmod:Restrikeler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a random Strike from your draw pile into your hand.
hadesmod:Restrikeler.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a Strike from your draw pile into your hand.

hadesmod:PrepareAttack.NAME: Prepare Attack
hadesmod:PrepareAttack.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Your next Strike deals !zzz! additional damage.

hadesmod:ExposeShot.NAME: Expose Shot
hadesmod:ExposeShot.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.
hadesmod:ExposeShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Steal the enemy's Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

hadesmod:Camera.NAME: Camera
hadesmod:Camera.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add a random Attack into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust. NL Exhaust.
hadesmod:Camera.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Add a random Upgraded Attack into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust. NL Exhaust.

hadesmod:CameraSmack.NAME: Camera Smack
hadesmod:CameraSmack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Camera into your hand.
hadesmod:CameraSmack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Camera+ into your hand.

hadesmod:DeepPull.NAME: Deep Pull
hadesmod:DeepPull.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Your next Strike is played twice. NL Exhaust.
hadesmod:DeepPull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Your next Strike is played twice. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

hadesmod:RevolverStrike.NAME: Revolver Strike
hadesmod:RevolverStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals !M! additional damage for each debuff stack on the enemy.

hadesmod:WepSpamm.NAME: Weaponry Spam
hadesmod:WepSpamm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Activate your Weapon.
hadesmod:WepSpamm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Activate your Weapon.

hadesmod:StrikeLove.NAME: Strike Love
hadesmod:StrikeLove.DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL Whenever you play a Strike, gain [E] .
hadesmod:StrikeLove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Strike, gain [E] .

hadesmod:CameraSpamma.NAME: Camera Spamma
hadesmod:CameraSpamma.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Camera into your hand.
hadesmod:CameraSpamma.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a *Camera into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Camera+ into your hand.

hadesmod:StengthOfAlistar.NAME: Strength Of Alistar
hadesmod:StengthOfAlistar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, fill your hand with *Cameras.
hadesmod:StengthOfAlistar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, fill your hand with *Cameras+.

hadesmod:DrawDamage.NAME: Draw to Damage
hadesmod:DrawDamage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card during your turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.
hadesmod:DrawDamage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw a card during your turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

hadesmod:Strikeshield.NAME: Strike Shield
hadesmod:Strikeshield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your next Strike grants !M! Block.

hadesmod:Hitpower.NAME: Hitpower
hadesmod:Hitpower.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each Strike played this turn. NL Exhaust.
hadesmod:Hitpower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain [E] for each Strike played this turn. NL Exhaust.

hadesmod:SplashyHit.NAME: Splashy Hit
hadesmod:SplashyHit.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Your next Strike applies !zzz! Weak. NL Exhaust.

hadesmod:HeroMode.NAME: HERO MODE
hadesmod:HeroMode.DESCRIPTION: Cards in your hand cost 1 and become Strike Attacks with !M! bonus damage this combat. NL Exhaust.

hadesmod:SwapTrick.NAME: Swap Trick
hadesmod:SwapTrick.DESCRIPTION: Swap Weapons. NL Your next Strike Activates your Weapon.
hadesmod:SwapTrick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Swap Weapons. NL Your next Strike Activates your Weapon.

hadesmod:SickeningStrength.NAME: Sickening Strength
hadesmod:SickeningStrength.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff, gain 1 Strength this turn.
hadesmod:SickeningStrength.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you apply a debuff, gain 1 Strength this turn.

hadesmod:CarePackage.NAME: Care Package
hadesmod:CarePackage.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Add !zzz! *Camera into your hand.
hadesmod:CarePackage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Add !zzz! *Cameras into your hand.

hadesmod:GunCameras.NAME: Tabloids
hadesmod:GunCameras.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a *Camera, apply !M! hadesmod:Pestered to ALL enemies.
hadesmod:GunCameras.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a *Camera, apply !M! hadesmod:Pestered to ALL enemies. NL Add 1 *Camera into your hand.

hadesmod:MidasTouch.NAME: Midas Touch
hadesmod:MidasTouch.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Give all cards in your hand, draw pile, and discard pile hadesmod:Goldcast. NL Exhaust.
hadesmod:MidasTouch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal. NL Give all cards in your hand, draw pile, and discard pile hadesmod:Goldcast. NL Exhaust.

hadesmod:StrengthOfAlistar.NAME: Strength of Alistar
hadesmod:StrengthOfAlistar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, fill your hand with *Cameras.
hadesmod:StrengthOfAlistar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, fill your hand with *Cameras+.

hadesmod:DrawHit.NAME: Drawn Hit
hadesmod:DrawHit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is increased by !M! for each card drawn during your turn.

hadesmod:GunCamera.NAME: Snap Shot
hadesmod:GunCamera.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL *Cameras in your hand become *Gun *Cameras that deal !M! damage.
hadesmod:GunCamera.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL *Cameras in your hand become *Gun *Cameras that deal !M! damage.

hadesmod:BitByBit.NAME: Bit by Bit
hadesmod:BitByBit.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies for each card in your hand.
hadesmod:BitByBit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies for each card in your hand. NL Draw 3 cards.

hadesmod:BestAngle.NAME: Best Angle
hadesmod:BestAngle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Cards from *Cameras cost 0 this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Cards from *Cameras cost 0 this turn. NL Add 1 *Camera into your hand.

hadesmod:SelfieForm.NAME: Selfie Form
hadesmod:SelfieForm.DESCRIPTION: Cards generated from *Cameras are always Upgraded.
hadesmod:SelfieForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Cards generated from *Cameras are always Upgraded.

hadesmod:DigIn.NAME: Dig In
hadesmod:DigIn.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Swap Weapons next turn.
hadesmod:DigIn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Swap Weapons next turn. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

hadesmod:Snapshoot.NAME: Snapshoot
hadesmod:Snapshoot.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 *Camera into your hand. NL Activate your Weapon.
hadesmod:Snapshoot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 1 *Camera+ into your hand. NL Activate your Weapon.

hadesmod:MailBomb.NAME: Mail Bomb
hadesmod:MailBomb.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Activate your Weapon. NL Draw !M! cards.

hadesmod:Spin.NAME: Spin
hadesmod:Spin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. NL Draw !M! cards.

hadesmod:SlotSlash.NAME: Slot Slash
hadesmod:SlotSlash.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand, then draw that many cards. NL Exhaust all cards with Retain discarded and deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each one.
hadesmod:SlotSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your hand, then draw that many cards. NL Exhaust all cards with Retain discarded and deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each one.

hadesmod:GuardyWardy.NAME: Guardy Wardy
hadesmod:GuardyWardy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain Temporary_HP equal to the total amount of debuffs on the enemy.

hadesmod:HitDrawBurn.NAME: Hit Draw Burn
hadesmod:HitDrawBurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust 1 card randomly.
hadesmod:HitDrawBurn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust 1 card.

hadesmod:IThinkEyePatchesAreHot.NAME: Eye Strike
hadesmod:IThinkEyePatchesAreHot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak.
hadesmod:IThinkEyePatchesAreHot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

hadesmod:OctoHit.NAME: Eightfold Strike
hadesmod:OctoHit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
hadesmod:OctoHit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards.

hadesmod:BestLaidPlans.NAME: Best Laid Plans
hadesmod:BestLaidPlans.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! cards.
hadesmod:BestLaidPlans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! cards.

hadesmod:DrainingDoom.NAME: Draining Doom
hadesmod:DrainingDoom.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their total stack of debuffs at the start of their turn.
hadesmod:DrainingDoom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their total stack of debuffs at the start of their turn.

hadesmod:DrawStrength.NAME: Drawn Strength
hadesmod:DrawStrength.DESCRIPTION: Grave. NL Whenever you draw a card during your turn, gain 1 Strength that turn.
hadesmod:DrawStrength.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card during your turn, gain 1 Strength that turn.

hadesmod:FullCamera.NAME: Full Camera
hadesmod:FullCamera.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, Swap Weapons.
